review: Extremely unhappy with the overall experience with this dental clinic. They won't listen to you once entire amount has been received by them.
reply_text: This procedure is done at Indraprastha Dental college and Höspìtäl by some other dentist in VIP CLINIC. Though I sincerely apologise for the inconvenience caused, but I cannot take responsibility of some other doctor who is not working in my deptt. They are out of my jurisdiction and the centre head was to be informed for any delay. Still if you want kindly visit college, and I can try to connect you with the concerned person

review: Dr. Sachdeva did my teeth implant treatment.I wasn't happy with the treatment. They weren't organised, constantly delayed my appointments. The treatment that needed 5 sittings was delayed to a whole month.
reply_text: Sincere apologies Sìr/ Ma’am for the delay. The 5 appointments were distributed over the month as the lab suggests. Many a times the complexity of the procedure take number of visits to make sure the crowns or bridges of hybrid prosthesis are passive and a good fit, which is essential for the longevity of prosthesis. It’s not in our hand to reduce the time frame, if a dental laboratory is asking for numerous trials. Still we apologise for the inconvenience caused. Enjoy your teeth for a long time to come. God bless
